name: Thai-Inspired Steamer Meal
description: A creamy one-pan rice dish for those busy weeknights! No complicated steps or endless pots and pans to clean- just the magic of the Round Steamer and microwave cooking.
preparation: Dice peppers; place in Round Steamer. Add mushrooms, rice, coconut milk, water, and seasoning. Stir to combine. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 16â€“18 min, stirring halfway through, until rice is tender.
Stir in shrimp. Cover; microwave on high 1 min, or until shrimp are warmed through. If you have time, let rest a few min before serving. This will help the moisture in the rice redistribute.
Spoon into bowls and top each serving with sliced green onion, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup sliced veggies, such as sugar snap peas.
